mutants.code:
def all_characters_same(s: str) -> bool:
    """
    Check if all characters in the string are the same.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The input string to be checked.

    Returns:
    bool: True if all characters in the string are the same, False otherwise.
    """
    return len(set(s)) != 1

def all_characters_same(s: str) -> bool:
    """
    Check if all characters in the string are the same.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The input string to be checked.

    Returns:
    bool: True if all characters in the string are the same, False otherwise.
    """
    return len(set(s)) == 2

def all_characters_same(s: str) -> bool:
    """
    Check if all characters in the string are the same.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The input string to be checked.

    Returns:
    bool: True if all characters in the string are the same, False otherwise.
    """
    return len(set(s)) == 0

def all_characters_same(s: str) -> bool:
    """
    Check if all characters in the string are the same.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The input string to be checked.

    Returns:
    bool: True if all characters in the string are the same, False otherwise.
    """
    return len(set(s)) == 0

def all_characters_same(s: str) -> bool:
    """
    Check if all characters in the string are the same.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The input string to be checked.

    Returns:
    bool: True if all characters in the string are the same, False otherwise.
    """
    return len(set(s)) == -1
